Pre-Game Insights: Apostolos Stamatelopoulos is back in the Subway Socceroos squad and is determined to make an impact in the upcoming FIFA World Cup 2026™ Round Three qualifiers against China PR and Japan.
Stamatelopoulos netted his first goal for new club Motherwell at the weekend and hopes to continue that goal-scoring form in front of a home crowd at Adelaide Oval.
Stamatelopoulos expressed pride in representing the Socceroos at home in Adelaide and emphasized the team's focus on securing three points against China PR.
Stamatelopoulos mentioned that China PR is expected to sit very deep and try to keep a clean sheet, and the Socceroos' strategy will be to break them down and get the first goal.
Stamatelopoulos discussed adapting to new coach Tony Popovic, noting his intense and hard-working approach.
